CCleaner

Brief:

CCleaner, developed by Piriform, is a widely acknowledged utility tool designed to optimize device performance by cleaning out unnecessary files, managing RAM space, monitoring system usage, and protecting against viruses. This application boasts a user-friendly interface to maintain optimal phone operation with just a few taps.
